Description:
IN/GMcE080322/01-312369987
You have failed to ensure that the Local exhaust ventilation system provided to control exposure to welding fumes (which is a substance hazardous to health) has been subject to a thorough examination and test within the preceding 14 months.

IN/GMcE080322/02-312370035
You have not taken suitable and sufficient measures to prevent, so far as is reasonably practicable, any person falling a distance liable to cause personal injury in that you have failed to provide coverings for inspection pit openings when they are not in use.
